## PagesAnalyticsReporter class

Responsible for reporting Pages Analytics Events

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PagesAnalyticsReporter implements PagesAnalyticsService 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [PagesAnalyticsService](./analytics.pagesanalyticsservice.md)

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [pageView()](./analytics.pagesanalyticsreporter.pageview.md) |  | Reports a page view event. Will preform a promise rejection if the API contains an error or if the parameters are misconfigured. |
|  [setDebugEnabled(enabled)](./analytics.pagesanalyticsreporter.setdebugenabled.md) |  | Turns on debug logging for event details. Will log details to the console when report() is called. |
|  [setVisitor(visitor)](./analytics.pagesanalyticsreporter.setvisitor.md) |  | Sets the [Visitor](./analytics.visitor.md) object which is included with each subsequent request. |
|  [track(event)](./analytics.pagesanalyticsreporter.track.md) |  | Turns on debug logging for event details. Will log details to the console when report() is called. |
